description: Slash Text-to-Speech Costs by up to 90%. Up to 10x cheaper than Eleven Labs and Play.ht. Up to 2x cheaper than Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
title: Text-to-Speech API - Unreal Speech
introduction: Unreal Speech offers a text-to-speech API that allows users to convert text into high-quality audio. It is designed to be cost-effective, providing significant savings compared to other services.
targetPeople: Businesses and developers needing high-volume text-to-speech conversion

faqs.question: Do you offer voices in other languages?
faqs.answer: We currently only have English speaking voices. But we're working on multilingual voice support, expected to be available in 3-6 months.

faqs.question: Can I create custom voices (voice cloning)?
faqs.answer: Not right now, but we're working on it!

faqs.question: What happens if I use all of my monthly characters?
faqs.answer: Additional usage over the monthly allowance will be charged daily at the rate of your current plan: Basic – $16 per 1M characters, Plus – $12 per 1M characters, Pro – $10 per 1M characters, Enterprise – $8 per 1M characters.

faqs.question: What happens to unused characters at the end of the month?
faqs.answer: Free plan – Characters are reset on the 1st of every month. Paid plan – Unused characters roll over to the next billing cycle.

faqs.question: Can I use generated audio commercially?
faqs.answer: Yes, audio generated with Unreal Speech can be used commercially. The following terms apply, based on your subscription plan: Free plan – You must attribute Unreal Speech when publishing audio by including a link to 'unrealspeech.com' in the description. Paid plan – You do not need to include any attribution.

faqs.question: How do I update my payment method?
faqs.answer: Go to your Dashboard and choose 'Manage Subscription'.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Go to your Dashboard and choose 'Manage Subscription'.

faqs.question: Do you have an affiliate program?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can earn 15% recurring on all paid referrals. Click here to sign up.
